# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value, worth $10000 to you, and I believe it could greatly benefit your endeavors. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special price of $9500. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. Don't miss out on this chance to acquire a product that promises to deliver outstanding results and value. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let me know. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
